title: Suzuki predicts India market to expand 2% in FY25, Maruti to outpace industry growth
description: India is a bright spot for the Japanese auto giant, accounting for as much as 89% of the incremental volume of 168,000 units sold by Suzuki globally in the last fiscal year. While sales fell in several key markets,  the Indian subsidiary posted a 9% increase in volume at 1.79 million units in fiscal 2024.
